mapper.select: select * from grow where babyno=#{babyno} order by growregdate asc
select babyno, userno, babyname, babygender, babybirth, babyage, growregdate, growbmi from grow where babyno=#{babyno} and babyage >= 24 order by growregdate asc

select g.babyno, g.babyname, g.babygender, g.growheight, g.growweight, g.growhead, g.babyage, g.growbmi, gd.gender, gd.age, gd.height, gd.weight_a, gd.head, gd.bmi, (g.growheight - gd.height) m1, (g.growweight - gd.weight_a) m2, (g.growhead - gd.head) m3 from grow g, grow_default gd where g.babyno = #{babyno} and g.babyage = #{babyage} and g.babyage = gd.age and g.babygender = gd.gender

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT babyno, userno, babyname, babygender, babybirth, growheight, growweight, growhead, babyage, growregdate, growbmi, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY growregdate DESC) AS RN FROM grow WHERE babyno = #{babyno} ) WHERE RN = 1
